name: Scrash
description: Being dubbed "Pong on crack", Scrash is a two player face-off with breakable blocks, air hockey and table-tennis all in one.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 + Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Must support Chromium 62+
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Must support Chromium 62+
